mapper.sql:
RID, CREATTIME,
BEGIN_IP, END_IP, MODIFIEDTIME,
RECORDSTATE, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX

RID, CREATTIME,
BEGIN_IP, END_IP, MODIFIEDTIME,
RECORDSTATE, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX
mapper.select: select ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX from smms_room_iprange as ssr where substring_index(#{IP},'.',3) = substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',3) and cast(substring_index(#{IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) >= cast(substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and cast(substring_index(#{IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) <= cast(substring_index(ssr.END_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and RECORDSTATE='0'

select ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX from smms_room_iprange as ssr where substring_index(#{DST_IP},'.',3) = substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',3) and cast(substring_index(#{DES_IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) >= cast(substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and cast(substring_index(#{DST_IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) <= cast(substring_index(ssr.END_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and RECORDSTATE='0'

select ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX from smms_room_iprange as ssr where substring_index(#{DES_IP},'.',3) = substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',3) and cast(substring_index(#{DES_IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) >= cast(substring_index(ssr.BEGIN_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and cast(substring_index(#{DES_IP},'.',-1) as signed integer ) <= cast(substring_index(ssr.END_IP,'.',-1) as signed integer ) and RECORDSTATE='0'
mapper.update: update SMMS_ROOM_IPRANGE set RECORDSTATE='1' where ACCESS_ID =#{ACCESS_ID} and ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX} And BEGIN_IP=#{BEGIN_IP} and END_IP=#{END_IP}
mapper.select: select BEGIN_IP as begin_ip, END_IP as end_ip from SMMS_ROOM_IPRANGE where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID =#{ACCESS_ID} and ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX}
mapper.update: update SMMS_ROOM_IPRANGE set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_ROOM_IPRANGE ( RID, CREATTIME, CREATORID, BEGIN_IP, END_IP, MODIFIEDTIME, MODIFIERID, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_IDX) values ( #{RID}, #{CREATTIME}, #{CREATORID}, #{BEGIN_IP}, #{END_IP}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{MODIFIERID}, #{LIABMAN}, #{LIABDEPT}, #{LIABORG}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_IDX})
